alert.note: Alert for Brunswick; New Hanover; Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 30 at 3:54PM EDT until April 30 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM EDT FOR NEW HANOVER...EASTERN PENDER AND EAST CENTRAL BRUNSWICK COUNTIES... At 353 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cypress Creek to near Bald Head Island, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Carolina Beach, Wrightsville Beach, Kure Beach, Surf City, South Masonboro Island, Snows Cut, Rich Inlet, Figure Eight Island, North Masonboro Island, Hampstead, Topsail Beach, Maple Hill, Myrtle Grove, Murrayville, Masonboro, University Of North Carolina At Wilmington, Scotts Hill, Ogden and Woodside. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
